that the show's producers opted not to bring in a Simon Cowell clone, the formula simply does not work without someone willing to be an ass to kids with big dreams but no chops," Highkin wrote. Granted, the audition rounds are always rough at first, and Jackson, Steven Tyler , and Jennifer Lopez are still getting used to working together, but I couldn't help but to notice how much the show's standards are lowered with Simon Cowell out of the picture. Entertainment Weekly asked in a poll whether fans enjoyed the first episode, inquiring: "Will the inclusion of 15-year-olds turn "Idol' into glorified tryouts for` Glee"? So much to take in,

"He's my first Division I recruit," the Albert said of Jarrell McKinney . He has tremendous speed. He runs the 40 in 4.5. He's 6-5, 210, and when he goes to college they're going to put another 20-30 pounds on him. Playing defensive end, he's going to be outstanding. He's the role model for our other kids.... He's that bar that we have to set for ourselves. Cody has an experienced offensive line and receivers coming back, and the Albert said junior-to-be quarterback Mario Gulley "has Michael Vick capabilities." Ad Feedback Indiana Rep. Mike Pence announced Thursday he won't seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012, but hinted a possible run for governor. In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana, he said in a letter being sent to supporters.
